p: In total, approximately 160 mL blood (corresponding to approximately 11 tablespoons of blood) will be withdrawn within the scope of the study whereof 42 mL (approximately 3 tablespoons) are part of the routine practice and 117 mL (approximately 8 tablespoons) are additional withdrawals due to the study participation. This total amount of blood which will be withdrawn does not exceed the maximum allowable total blood draw volumes for clinical research studies. 30
